Lyric:
[00:59.54]Well I've heard there was a secret chord
[01:03.52]That David played and it pleased the Lord
[01:06.89]But you don't really care for music, do you?
[01:13.70]Well it goes like this:
[01:15.35]The fourth, the fifth, the minor fall and the major lift
[01:21.15]The baffled king composing Hallelujah

[01:27.16]Hallelujah
[01:30.77]Hallelujah
[01:34.42]Hallelujah
[01:37.86]Hallelujah

[01:48.96]Well your faith was strong but you needed proof
[01:52.57][01:48.96]You saw her bathing on the roof
[01:56.10]Her beauty and the moonlight overthrew ya
[02:03.30]She tied you to her kitchen chair
[02:06.89]And she broke your throne and she cut your hair
[02:10.29]And from your lips she drew the Hallelujah

[02:16.60]Hallelujah
[02:20.14]Hallelujah
[02:23.92]Hallelujah
[02:27.47]Hallelujah

[02:39.17]But baby I've been here before
[02:42.93]I've seen this room and I've walked this floor
[02:45.51]You know, I used to live alone before I knew ya
[02:53.14]And I've seen your flag on the marble arch
[02:56.87]And love is not a victory march
[03:00.13]It's a cold and it's a broken Hallelujah

[03:06.59]Hallelujah
[03:10.28]Hallelujah
[03:13.78]Hallelujah
[03:17.48]Hallelujah

[03:29.11]Well there was a time when you let me know
[03:32.82]What's really going on below
[03:35.87]But now you never show that to me do ya
[03:42.84]But remember when I moved in you
[03:46.57]And the holy dove was moving too
[03:50.50]And every breath we drew was Hallelujah

[03:56.26]Hallelujah
[03:59.81]Hallelujah
[04:03.40]Hallelujah
[04:06.89]Hallelujah

[05:00.54]Maybe there's a God above
[05:04.36]But all I've ever learned from love
[05:07.68]Was how to shoot somebody who outdrew ya

[05:14.86]And it's not a cry that you hear at night
[05:20.15]It's not somebody who's seen the light
[05:23.44]It's a cold and it's a broken Hallelujah

[05:29.75]Hallelujah
[05:33.21]Hallelujah
[05:36.70]Hallelujah
[05:40.31]Hallelujah
[05:44.26]Hallelujah
[05:47.39]Hallelujah
[05:50.78]Hallelujah
[05:54.25]Hallelujah
[05:57.74]Hallelujah
[06:01.23]Hallelujah
[06:04.94]Hallelujah
[06:10.76]Hallelujah(long)

[06:34.98]Hallelujah
